title: Mirror
lyrics:
Amu ildo anilago haessjanh-a
Geogjeonghal pil-yo eobsdago haessjanh-a
Seuchyeo jinagal seulpeum-il geola
Modu gwaenchanh-ajil geola haessjanh-a
Geunde yojeum deul-eo giun-i eobs-eo boyeo

Yojeum deul-eo nega han-eobs-i meolgeman

Nachseolgeman neukkyeojyeo



Dol-awa jwo dasi yejeoncheoleom

Naleul bomyeo hwanhage us-eojwo

Yojeum-en nal balaboneun

Neoui geu nunbich-i

Han-eobs-i seulpeo boyeo



Amugeosdo anilago haessjanh-a

Singyeong sseul pil-yo eobsdago haessjanh-a

Geu nuguboda ganghan neonikka

Modu igyeonael su issda haessjanh-a



Geunde yojeum deul-eo eokkaega chyeojyeo boyeo

Yojeum deul-eo nega han-eobs-i jaggeman

Geuleohgeman neukkyeojyeo



Dol-awa jwo dasi yejeoncheoleom

Naleul bomyeo hwanhage us-eojwo

Yojeum-en nal balaboneun

Neoui geu nunbich-i

Han-eobs-i seulpeo boyeo
